mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id AS user_id, ap.application_id AS application_id, a.code AS app_code, m.code AS res_code FROM gar_users u, gar_applications a, gar_user_application ap, gar_user_department ud, gar_role_department rd, gar_role_permission rp, gar_permissions p, gar_resources m WHERE m.status = 1 AND p.status = 1 AND a.application_id = ap.application_id AND ap.user_id = u.user_id AND ud.user_id = u.user_id AND rd.department_id = ud.department_id AND rp.role_id = rd.role_id AND p.permission_id = rp.permission_id AND m.application_id = p.application_id AND m.path LIKE p.wildcard
